name: Vornado Realty Trust
description: Vornado Realty Trust is a publicly traded real estate investment trust (REIT) that focuses on the ownership, management, and development of office and retail properties in the United States. Founded in 1982 and headquartered in New York City, Vornado is one of the largest owners of commercial real estate in the country, with a diverse portfolio that includes iconic properties in prime locations. The company is renowned for its high-quality assets and has a significant presence in major markets such as New York City and Washington D.C. Vornado's strategy involves not only acquiring and managing properties but also engaging in significant redevelopment projects, enhancing the value of its assets through innovative design and sustainable practices. With a strong commitment to environmental responsibility, Vornado integrates sustainability into its operations, focusing on energy efficiency, waste reduction, and improving the overall environmental performance of its buildings. The company aims to provide long-term value to its shareholders while contributing positively to the communities it serves. Vornado Realty Trust is committed to maintaining a diversified portfolio and actively seeks opportunities to expand its footprint in high-growth areas.
headquarters: New York City, New York, USA

seo.meta_title: Vornado Realty Trust | Leading Commercial Real Estate Investment Trust
seo.meta_description: Explore Vornado Realty Trust, a major REIT with a focus on high-quality office and retail properties in key U.S. markets. Learn about our sustainable practices and community impact.
